mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, BO_CATEGORY_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, BOARD_STATUS, BOARD_LIKE, ATT_NO, ATT_PATH, CHANGE_NAME, ATT_STATUS, ATT_LELVEL FROM TB_INFO JOIN TB_BOARD_CATEGORY ON(BO_CATEGORY_CODE = CATEGORY_CODE) LEFT JOIN (SELECT BOARD_NO, COUNT(*) BOARD_LIKE FROM TB_LIKE GROUP BY BOARD_NO) USING(BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_ATTACHMENT USING(BOARD_NO) JOIN TB_BOARD_BRIDGE USING(BOARD_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND PLACE_NO = 412
